com.io7m.r2.core

Interface R2DepthInstancesType

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2DepthInstances

    public interface R2DepthInstancesType
    The set of depth instances in a scene.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • depthsSetFaceCulling

        void depthsSetFaceCulling(com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLFaceSelection f)
        Set which faces will be culled for the rendered instances. The default if none are specified is JCGLFaceSelection.FACE_BACK.
        Parameters:
        f - The faces to be culled

      • depthsGetFaceCulling

        com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLFaceSelection depthsGetFaceCulling()
        Returns:
        The faces to be culled during rendering
        See Also:
        depthsSetFaceCulling(JCGLFaceSelection)

      • depthsReset

        void depthsReset()
        Remove all instances from the scene.
